why_visit_a_speech_pathologist: Why did you visit a speech pathologist?
ideas_about_the_environment: General ideas about the environment. Understanding by the child of speech addressed to him
how_is_your_mother_name_your_dad: How is your mother's name? Your dad?
what_season_is_it_now: What season is it now? Times of Day?
what_did_you_do_yesterday: What did you do yesterday? What did you do in the morning? What are you doing tomorrow?
formation_of_ideas_about_the_world_aroun: Formation of ideas about the world around:
the_stock_of_knowledge_about_the_world_i: The stock of knowledge about the world is extremely low
The stock of knowledge about the world is below the age norm
the_stock_of_knowledge_about_the_surroun: The stock of knowledge about the surrounding world corresponds to the age
the_child_knows: the child knows / does not know how old he is, what season it is, what time of day it is, what he did yesterday, what he did in the morning, what he will do tomorrow
the_child_knows_his_name_where_he_lives: The child knows/does not know his name, his parents' names, where he lives
somatognosis_the_concept_of_own_body: Somatognosis: the concept of one's own body
take_an_imaginary_phone_in_your_hand_and: Take an imaginary phone in your hand and put it to your ear
left_handedall_4_indicators_are_the_same: Left-handed, all 4 indicators are the same:
right_handedall_4_indicators_are_the_sam: Right-handed, all 4 indicators are the same:
there_are_minor_difficulties_in_updating: there are minor difficulties in updating words, storing and reproducing verbal information
there_are_pronounced_difficulties_in_upd: there are pronounced difficulties in updating words, storing and reproducing verbal information
there_are_difficulties_in_establishing_a: There are difficulties in establishing adequate links between objects and phenomena of the surrounding world
visually_effective_thinking: Visually effective thinking. The solution of mental problems is carried out only at the level of practical actions.
visually_shaped_thinking_there_are_eleme: Visually-shaped thinking, there are elements of verbal-logical thinking
verbal_logical_capable_of_giving_a_logic: Verbal-logical, capable of giving a logical explanation to his actions
the_level_of_perception_corresponds_to_t: the level of perception corresponds to the age
does_not_correspond_to_the_age: Does not correspond to the age
the_level_of_perception_does_not_corresp: the level of perception does not correspond to the age
the_state_of_the_articulatory_apparatus_: The state of the articulatory apparatus and motor development
fence: Fence (Smile and show the rows of clenched teeth. The top row should sit exactly above the bottom)
shoulder: Shoulder (The mouth is wide open, and the tongue is on the lower lip)
needle: Needle (Open your mouth, straight narrow tongue sticking out of the mouth)
mushroom: Mushroom (Open your mouth and touch your palate with your tongue)
an_hour: An hour (Open your mouth, stick out your tongue. Move it from one corner of the lips to the other)
swing: Swing (Smile, open your mouth wide. Touch the tip of your tongue, then the upper lip, then the lower)
the_horse: The horse (Push the tongue to the palate, click it and clink)
spasticity_of_the_muscles_of_the_tongue: Spasticity of the muscles of the tongue
hypotonia_of the muscles of the tongue: Hypotonia of the muscles of the tongue
deviation_of_the_tongue_deviations_of_th: Deviation of the tongue (deviations of the tongue to the side)
stand_on_one_leg_on_the_other_count_up_t: Stand on one leg, on the other (count up to 4x)
get_up_on_your_tiptoes_wait_count_up_to_: Get up on your tiptoes, wait (count up to 4x)
jump_on_one_leg_the_other_two_count_up_t: Jump on one leg, the other, two (count up to 5 on each leg)
violations_of_the_coordination_of_action: Violations of the coordination of actions of the hands
violations_of_certain_aspects_of_sensori: Violations of certain aspects of sensorimotor function:
motor_functions_of_the_hands_and_fingers: Motor functions of the hands and fingers:
finger_praxis_formed_reproduced_the_fing: Finger praxis formed. Reproduced the finger pose without difficulty
finger_praxis_formed_reproduced_finger_p: Finger praxis formed. Reproduced finger posture with difficulty
finger_praxis_is_not_formed_did_not_repr: Finger praxis is not formed. Did not reproduce the finger pose
the_structure_of_the_articulatory_appara: The structure of the articulatory apparatus
changing_the_shape_of_the_teeth: Changing the shape of the teeth:
anomalies_of_the_frenulum_of_the_upper_l: Anomalies of the frenulum of the upper/lower lip
malformations_of_the_maxillofacial_regio: Malformations of the maxillofacial region and systemic anomalies of the soft tissues and bones of the face:
the_level_of_formation_of_phonetic_phono: The level of formation of phonetic-phonological competence:
The level of formation of phonetic-phonological competence corresponds to the age norm
The level of formation of phonetic-phonological competence does not correspond to the age norm
difficulty_distinguishing_voiceless_and_: Difficulty distinguishing voiceless and voiced consonants
impaired_distinction_between_hard_and_so: Impaired distinction between hard and soft consonants
impaired_distinction_between_affricates_: Impaired distinction between affricates and their constituent sounds
are_in_the_very_early_stages_of_developm: Are in the very early stages of development. The child can analyze the sound range, consisting of
are_in_the_active_stage_of_formation_the: Are in the active stage of formation; the child can analyze words like
the_syllabic_structure_of_the_word_is_no: The syllabic structure of the word is not broken
the_game_how_the_mouse_could_not_sleep: The game "How the mouse could not sleep"
listen_to_the_story_put_the_pictures_in_: - Listen to the story. Put the pictures in order.
the_little_mouse_could_not_sleep: The little mouse couldn't sleep. So in the middle of the night he went for a walk in the woods. He found an apple in the grass and ate it. He also found a berry and ate that too. Then he noticed a glowing circle in a puddle. He thought it was a piece of cheese and tried to gobble it up too, but couldn't. He didn’t want it to go to waste! So he covered it up with a leaf to keep it safe until morning. Then in the morning, instead of a white circle in the water, he found a big red sun.
little_mouse_in_the_yard_at_night: Little mouse in the yard at night
the_little_mouse_eats_an_apple_and_a_ber: The little mouse eats an apple and a berry
the_moon_in_the_reflection_of_water_in_a: The moon in the reflection of water in a puddle
the_little_mouse_covers_the_puddle_with_: The little mouse covers the puddle with burdock
the_sun_in_the_reflection_of_water_in_a_: The sun in the reflection of water in a puddle
what_was_the_white_glowing_circle: 1. What was the white glowing circle?
when_did_the_little_mouse_go_out_for_a_w: 2. When did the little mouse go out for a walk?
what_did_the_little_mouse_see_outside: 3. What did the little mouse see outside?
what_did_the_little_mouse_cover_the_moon: 4. What did the little mouse cover the moon with?
what_did_the_little_mouse_see_in_the_pud: 5. What did the little mouse see in the puddle in the morning?
what_did_the_little_mouse_see_the_sun_in: 6. How did the little mouse see the sun instead of the moon?
retell_the_story_how_you_remember_it: Retell the story how you remember it.
can_build_his_own_statement_based_on_vis: Can build his own statement based on visual information received
cannot_build_his_own_statement_based_on_: Cannot build his own statement based on visual information received
the_story_does_not_fit_the_story: The story doesn't fit the story
is_fluent_in_linguistic_means_and_adequa: Is fluent in linguistic means and adequately uses them when constructing a coherent text
inadequately_uses_linguistic_means_when_: inadequately uses linguistic means when constructing a coherent text
the_probability_of_occurrence_of_adverse: The probability of occurrence of adverse events in the reproduction of the text:
the_retelling_contains_both_basic_and_ad: The retelling contains both basic and additional information
when_retelling_speech_variability_is_use: When retelling, speech variability is used
there_are_some_difficulties_in_reproduci: There are some difficulties in reproducing the text:
retelling_partially_corresponds_to_the_o: Retelling partially corresponds to the original
the_summary_contains_only_basic_informat: The summary contains only basic information
the_vocabulary_and_syntactic_constructio: The vocabulary and syntactic constructions of the original are preserved
the_coherence_and_logic_of_the_presentat: The coherence and logic of the presentation is not broken
there_are_significant_difficulties_in_th: There are significant difficulties in the reproduction of the text:
retelling_does_not_match_the_original: Retelling does not match the original
the_semantic_organization_of_the_text_is: The semantic organization of the text is broken
the_coherence_and_logic_of_the_presentat: The coherence and logic of the presentation is broken
significant_difficulties_in_the_language: Significant difficulties in the language design of the text
understands_only_the_basic_information_o: Understands only the basic information of the text
understanding_of_both_basic_and_addition: Understanding of both basic and additional information of each semantic part of the text is available
understanding_of_the_hidden_meaning_is_a: Understanding of the hidden meaning is available
examination_of_the_level_of_formation_of: Examination of the level of formation of the lexicon
the_presence_of_the_phenomenon_of_aliena: The presence of the phenomenon of alienation of the meaning of the word
the_level_of_formation_of_the_lexicon: The level of formation of the lexicon:
violation_of_the_word_actualization_the_: Violation of the word actualization - the choice of a word from the semantic field is violated
verbal_a_mixture_of_species_characterist: Verbal - a mixture of species characteristics
verbal_replacing_the_name_of_an_object_w: Verbal - replacing the name of an object with a contextual action
very_few_peripheral_words_even_from_the_: Very few "peripheral" words even from the most common, pragmatically valuable thematic groups for this age
the_dictionary_mainly_consists_of_words_: The dictionary mainly consists of words denoting objects, there is a shortage of the verb dictionary, there are practically no words denoting the features and qualities of objects. The dictionary is represented by a small number of everyday words
the_system_organization_of_the_dictionar: The system organization of the dictionary is at the very initial stage of formation; weak associative connections are observed, random, unmotivated associations predominate
the_organization_of_the_dictionary_is_un: The organization of the dictionary is unsystematic, lacking motivated adequate associations
the_systemic_organization_of_the_diction: The systemic organization of the dictionary is at the level of establishing primary thematically/situationally conditioned connections, there are pronounced (minor) difficulties in establishing generic, antonymic, etc. relationships between words included in an individual vocabulary; there are many words in the lexicon, the meaning of which is learned only at the nominative level

the systemic organization of the dictionary is distinguished by a large number and variety of semantic and formal connections; the lexicon is dominated by words whose meaning is learned at the conceptual level
